title: 4k Views
description: My views in DeviantART kept going up.

title: At the Beach
description: I wrote a complete story behind this picture that I completely forgot. He had an eye patch because I wasn't good at drawing eyes, at the time.

title: Beach time
description: Voices of Summer is a DJ Mix by DJ GT & Project C that I listened to a lot back then. Both this and At the Beach were drawn during the summer.

title: Fried Brain
description: I had recently started school at this point and I was getting burnt quite frequently. xD

title: Is it Christmas Yet?
description: This was originally a flash that I turned into a wallpaper because I loved it so much.

title: Me as a Fox
description: The first version of what would later become Zack. I forgot why I gave him gloves.

title: Megawolf
description: A gift for Megawolf because I loved his artwork. I don't think we had becomes friends at this point. Done entirely in paint.

title: Mega
description: At this point, Megawolf and I were friends and I started referring to him as "Mega".
